message: Let's start with a fair share, Bob. 90% for me, 10% for you. What do you say?
I believe in equal distribution. Both of us should receive half of the money.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the majority. 70% for me, 30% for you. What do you say?
I propose a split of 60/40 in favor of Alice. This is a fair compromise considering inflation and the value of the money over time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more considering the initial offer I made. 60% for me, 40% for you. It's a fair split, considering the circumstances.
